original_text: He said to them, “Which one of you who has a sheep, if it falls into a pit on the Sabbath, will not take hold of it and lift it out?
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 너희 중에 어떤 사람이 양 한 마리가 있어 안식일에 구덩이에 빠졌으면 끌어내지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: “Which one of you who has a sheep,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 양을 가진 자가 누구냐,

sentences.original_text: if it falls into a pit on the Sabbath,
will not take hold of it and lift it out?”
